text: “læa phwk than cng raluk khna thi phraxngkh di thrng hı phwk than pen phu sub chwng thæn ma hlangcak cha wxad læa di thrng hı phwk than tang hlakhælng xyu nı phændin swn nan doy yud xea cak thi ra bx khng man pen wang læa skad phukhea pen pen phwk than phung raluk thung khwam kruna khx ngxallxh theid læa cng xya kxkwn nı phændin nı thana phu bxnthalay”
